paragraphs.content: Then said the Pharisees unto him, Why will ye not receive us with our baptism, seeing we keep the whole law?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then said the Pharisees unto him, Why will ye not receive us with our baptism, seeing we keep the whole law?

paragraphs.content: But Jesus said unto them, Ye keep not the law. If ye had kept the law, ye would have received me, for I am he who gave the law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But Jesus said unto them, Ye keep not the law. If ye had kept the law, ye would have received me, for I am he who gave the law.

paragraphs.content: I receive not you with your baptism, because it profiteth you nothing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I receive not you with your baptism, because it profiteth you nothing.

paragraphs.content: For when that which is new is come, the old is ready to be put away.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For when that which is new is come, the old is ready to be put away.
